error.message: Call to deprecated method create() of class Drupal\openid_connect\OpenIDConnectStateToken. Deprecated in openid_connect:8.x-1.0-rc2 and is removed from openid_connect:8.x-2.0. Instead of the static OpenIDConnectStateToken::create, use the non-static \Drupal::service('openid_connect.state_token')->create() instead.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
